author: Matt Stieb
title: As Trump Admin Tells States to ‘Do Your Part,’ Governors Ask What Trump Is Doing
description: Governors continued to lambaste the Trump administration’s coronavirus negligence after the surgeon general told states to help manage the crisis.
content:
